title: Low priority queue
body: I got placed in 5 low priority queues after my computer turned of randomly at the start of the game but then i reconnected and won the game and then got placed in the queue is there anything i can do?

replies.body:
I'm afraid not, the lpq will not be revoked. You also would not receive a low priority queue for only one game, it has to happen on multiple occasions within a given timeframe.

It comes down to the fact that, regardless of the reason for leaving, intentional or not, you are still affecting the game of 9 other people negatively. If it happens rarely then you won't be punished for it. If it is happening frequently then you will be. [You can find more info about the system here if you wish.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ)

Hey Black Attack101

Sorry. But I don't think so. If you leave the game you put the team at a disadvantage :(
~Reported4Verbal~ OCE~  Always Happy To Help! :)
